changeSet.author: Binh Vu
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for Biocyc Ecocyc nodes

changeSet.id: LL-3164 Create Biocyc Ecocyc nodes on date 01282022
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_BioCyc {biocyc_id: row.biocyc_id}) SET n:db_BioCyc:db_EcoCyc:BioCycClass,n.name=row.name,n.eid=row.eid,n.synonyms=row.synonyms,n.data_source='BioCyc'

changeSet.id: LL-3164 Create Biocyc Ecocyc relationship on date 01282022
changeSet.author: Binh Vu

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MATCH (a:db_BioCyc {biocyc_id: row.from_id}), (b:db_BioCyc {biocyc_id: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:TYPE_OF]->(b)
